#Text=Human remains in mass grave confirm Argentina secret death camp
#Text=Friday , December 12 , 2008
#Text=File : Parque de la Memoria - Buenos Aires - Dennis Oppenheim - Monumento al escape . jpg
#Text=Memory Park - Buenos Aires Dennis Oppenheim 's Monument to the Escape was dedicated in October 2006 .

#Text=It is a memorial to the victims of the military regime during the Argentine Dirty War , a period of Argentinian state-sponsored violence from 1976 to 1983 . ( Image missing from commons : image ; log )

#Text=During a seven-month search , the Argentine Forensic Anthropology Team ( EAAF ) on Tuesday , confirmed more than 10,000 charred human bone fragments were unearthed between February and September , in a pit at Pozo de Arana , a former La Plata , Argentina secret government detention center .
#Text=The Arana prison or police station was used to torture prisoners during the so-called Argentina " Dirty War , " and was one of 300 used to interrogate Argentine prisoners .
#Text=The war refers to the state-sponsored violence against Argentine citizenry from roughly 1976 to 1983 carried out primarily by Jorge Rafael Videla 's military government .
#Text=The exact chronology of the repression is still debated , as trade unionists were targeted for assassination as early as 1973 .
#Text=Isabel Martínez de Perón 's " annihilation decrees " of 1975 , during Operativo Independencia , have also been suggested as the origin of The Dirty War .

column1: #Text=The official record reveals that up to 13,000 people disappeared , while 30,000 were killed during this time .
#Text=Argentine security forces and death squads worked hand in hand with other South American dictatorships in the frame of Operation Condor .
#Text=An Argentine court would later condemn the government 's crimes as crimes against humanity and " genocide " .

column1: #Text=EAAF president and forensic scientist Luis Fondebrider said that " in 25 years of searching , this was the first time that human remains were found at a former detention cente ; the magnitude of what the team has found where the Clandestine Center of Arana was located , merits that sometimes they show partial results .

#Text=" Fondebrider concluded that " this scientifically confirms the testimonies of the detained , the hundreds of survivors who have said for years that authorities tortured , killed and burned the bodies of political opponents .
#Text="

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=The anthropological discovery further reveals that a wall with more than 200 bullet marks or holes and an  important quantity " of used ammunition shells on the ground nearby , were found adjacent the mass pit grave .

column1: #Text=As evidence of executions , they were marked with red paint by forensic scientists .
#Text=The team , however , failed to determine how many bodies the fragments represented .

#Text=Maria Vedio , 47 , legal chairwoman for the Permanent Assembly for Human Rights La Plata said that " this is the first time there is proof that Arana was n't only a detention and torture center , but also a center of elimination .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Sara Derotier de Cobacho , secretary of human rights for Buenos Aires said ,  I ask the forgiveness of family members , because I can imagine what the mothers and all who are gathered here will feel , but what we are about to show is not to detail the genocide but so that we have proof for the trials that are to come ; but let us not forget , that behind every clandestine center there were the names of the repressors . ... so it is very important for all citizens to know those names ; we are looking for the truth so we can attain justice and construct , from there , the memory of our 30,000 ' desaparecidos ' .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Some of those responsible for the mass killings have been charged and meted life or death sentences .

#Text=The tribunal , besides handing the sentence , stated that Etchecolatz 's committed  crimes against humanity in the context of the genocide that took place in Argentina " .

column1: #Text=But the principal complainant , who was detained at Arana , has since disappeared .
